intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects the dining room light to be turned on automatically when the refrigerator door is opened.  
Constraints & cues: The command specifies the dining room light, but does not identify which of the three available meross light strips should be controlled. The refrigerator is currently on and its door is closed.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific light strip in the dining room to control, as the user did not specify. This could lead to controlling the wrong device if not clarified.
environment_overview:
1) 检测到的设备及位置：在餐厅有多个 meross 灯带，具体包括三个设备：第一个灯带（ID: 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298）具备开关、亮度调节、色温和颜色控制功能，当前亮度为70；第二个灯带（ID: 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709）同样具备上述功能，当前亮度为48；第三个灯带（ID: 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d）也具备相同功能，当前亮度为35。所有灯带的健康状态正常，检查间隔为60秒。

2) 当前状态及控制提示：在餐厅的灯带均处于开启状态。冰箱（Samsung LCD）当前处于关闭状态，开关为开启。用户命令要求在打开冰箱时开启餐厅的灯光，因此需要确认具体控制哪个灯带。若用户未指定，系统将考虑所有可用的灯带进行控制。
